bibl.title: Nāṭyaśāstra of Bharatamuni, with the commentary Abhinavabhāratī by Abhinavaguptācārya

editorialDecl.p: This e-text was double-keyboarded in Devanāgarī. It was converted to Roman transliteration automatically.

div.head: ṣaṣṭo ’dhyāyaḥ
śrīḥ
atha ṣaṣṭho ’dhyāyaḥ |

lg.l:
ayaṃ śloko nāsti | tatsthāne ‘ṛṣaya ūcuḥ’ iti paṭhyate
pūrvaraṅgavidhiṃ śrutvā punarāhurmahattamāḥ |
munayo bharatam bharataṃ munayaḥ sarve pañca praśnān bravīhi naḥ praśnānpañcābhidhatsva naḥ || 1 ||
ye rasā iti paṭhyante nāṭye nāṭyavicakṣaṇa nāṭyavicakṣaṇaiḥ|
rasatvaṃ kena vā kena vai teṣāmetadākhyātumarhasi || 2 ||
bhāvāścāpi bhāvāścaiva hi ye proktāḥ kathaṃ proktāḥ kiṃ vā te bhāvayantyapi bhāvayanti hi |
saṃgrahaṃ kārikāṃ kārikāścaiva caiva niruktaṃ cāpi cābhidhatsva naḥ caiva tattvataḥ || 3 ||
teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā munīnāṃ bharato muniḥ|
pratyuvāca punarvākyaṃ rasabhāvavikalpanam || 4 ||
ahaṃ vaḥ kathayiṣyāmi nikhilena tapodhanāḥ |
saṃgrahaṃ kārikāṃ rikāścaiva caiva niruktaṃ ca yathākramam yathāvidhi || 5 ||
na śakyamiha śakyamasya nāṭyasya gantumantaṃ kathañcana |
kasmādbahutvādbhāvānām kasmādbahutvājjñānānāṃ śilpānāṃ cāpi tattvataḥ vāpyanantataḥ || 6 ||
ekasyāpi na vai śakyamantam śakyastvanto jñānārṇavasya hi tu ca |
gantuṃ kiṃ punaranyeṣāṃ jñānānāma jñātumarthaṃ hi rthatattvataḥ || 7 ||
kintvalpasūtra gụ̄dhārtha alpagranthasūtrārtham granthārthamanumānaprasādhakam |
nāṭyasyāsya pravakṣyāmi rasabhāvādisaṅgraham || 8 ||
vistareṇopadiṣṭānāmarthānāṃ sūtrabhāṣyayoḥ |
nibaddho nibandho yaḥ samāsena saṅgrahaṃ taṃ vidurbudhāḥ || 9 ||
rasabhāvā rasā bhāvā hyabhinayāḥ dharmavṛtti dharmavṛtta dharmī vṛttipravṛttayaḥ |
siddhiḥ svarāstathātodyaṃ gānaṃ raṅgaśca saṅgrahaḥ || 10 ||
alpābhidhānenārtho yaḥ samāsenocyate budhaiḥ |
sūtrataḥ sā tu mantavyā sā tu vijñeyā sā ’numantavyā (nupaṭhitā) kārikārthapradarśinī prayoginī || 11 ||
nānānāmāśrayotpannaṃ nighaṇṭu nāṭyantu nigamānvitam |
dhātvarthahetusaṃyuktaṃ nānāsiddhāntasādhitam || 12 ||
sādhito sthāpito ’rtho bhavedyatra samāsenārthasūcakaḥ sūtrayoḥ |
dhātvarthavacaneneha niruktaṃ tad vidurbṛdhāḥ tatpracakṣate || 13 ||
saṅgraho yo mayā proktaḥ samāsena dvijottamāḥ |
vistaraṃ tasya vakṣyāmi saniruktaṃ sakārikam || 14 ||
hāsyaśṛṅgārakaruṇā śṛṅgārahāsyakaruṇā vīraraudra raudravīrabhayānakāḥ |
bībhatsādbhutasaṃjño saṃjñāścetyaṣṭau śāntāśca nava nāṭyarasāḥ cetyaṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ nāṭyarasāḥ smṛtāḥ || 15 ||
ete hyaṣṭau rasāḥ nava rasāḥ proktā dṛṣṭāḥ druhiṇena mahātmanā |
punaśca bhāvānvakṣyāmi sthāyisañcārisattvajān sāttvikān || 16 ||
rati hāso ratiśca rhāsaśca śokaśca krodhotsāhau bhayaṃ tathā |
jugupsā vismayaśceti ścaiva sthāyibhāvāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 17 ||
nirvedo ’tha tathā glāniśaṅkāsūyā nirvedaglāniśaṅkākhyāstathāsūyā madaḥ śramaḥ|
ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtirdhṛtiḥ mohamatismṛtīḥ || 18 ||
vrīḍā capalatā capalatā caiva harṣa āvego jaḍatā dhṛtiḥ tathā |
garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca || 19 ||
suptaṃ suptirvibodho vibodho ’ prabodho harṣaścāpyavahittha marṣaścāpyavahitthamathogratā |
matirvyādhistatho ratho aratirvyādhirunmādaḥ nmādastathā maraṇameva ca || 20 ||
trāsaścaiva vitarkaśca vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ |
trayastriṃśadamī bhāvāḥ samākhyātāstu nāmataḥ || 21 ||
stambhaḥ svedo ’tha romāñcaḥ svarabhedo ’tha svarasādotha svarabhaṅgo ’tha vepathuḥ|
vaivarṇyamaśru pralaya bhāvāstvaṣṭau tu sāttvikāḥ ityaṣṭau sāttvikāḥ smṛtāḥ || 22 ||
āṅgiko vācikaścaiva hyāhāryaḥ sāttvikastathā |
catvāro ’bhinayā hyete yeṣu nāṭyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam vijñeyā nāṭyakarmaṇi vijñeyā nāṭyasaṃśrayāḥ || 23 ||
laukikī nāṭyadharmī ca lokadharmī nāṭyadharmī dharmīti dharmī tu dvividhā smṛtā dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ|

Nreads here line दैविकी etc. of 26 below.
bhāratī sātvatī caiva vṛttirārabhaṭī kaiśikyārabhaṭī tathā || 24 ||
catasro vṛttayo hyetā yāsu hyetāḥ kaiśikyā saha kīrtitāḥ vijñeyā nāṭyasaṃśrayāḥ nāṭyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
āvantī dākṣiṇātyā ca tathā caivo caivārdha | caivāndhra ̣dhramāgadhī || 25 ||
pāñcālīmadhyamā pāñcālamadhyamā caiva ceti jñeyā nāṭyapravṛttayaḥ vijñeyāstu pravṛttayaḥ |

daivīti
apustake idamardha nāsti
daivikī mānuṣī caiva siddhistu dvividhaiva ca siddhiḥ syāddvividhaiva tu || 26 ||
śārīrā vaiṇavāścaiva śārīrāścaiva vaiṇāśca sapta ṣaḍjādayaḥ svarāḥ |

idamardha tapustaka eva dṛśyate | kṣapustake nāsti |
(niṣādarṣabhagāndhāramadhyapañcamadhaivatāḥ||)
tataṃ caivāvanaddhaṃ ca ghanaṃ suṣirameva ca || 27 ||
caturvidhaṃ va vijñeyamātodyaṃ lakṣaṇānvitam |
tataṃ tantrīgataṃ kṛtam jñeyamavanaddhaṃ tu pauṣkaram || 28 ||
ghanastu tālo vijñeyaḥ suṣiro vaṃśa eva ca |
praveśākṣepaniṣkrāmaprāsādikamathāntaram athāparam || 29 ||
gānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ jñeyaṃ dhruvāyogasamanvitam samudbhavam |
caturaśro vikṛṣṭaśca raṅgastryaśraśca tryasraścaiva hi maṇḍapaḥ kīrtitaḥ || 30 ||
evameṣo ’lpasūtrārtho nirdiṣṭo vyādiṣṭo nāṭyasaṃgrahaḥ |
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi sūtragranthavikalpanam || 31 ||

div.p: tatra rasāneva tāvadādāvabhi tāvadabhidhāsyāmaḥ tāvadabhidhāsye vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | na hi rasādṛte kaścidapyarthaḥ kaścidarthaḥ pravartate | tatra vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ |

ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā ca guḍādidravyairauṣadhiviśeṣaiśca svādvādayo rasā niṣpadyante evaṃ nānābhāvopagatā api sthāyino bhāvā rasatvamāpnuvanti ko dṛṣṭānta iti ceducyate | yathā nānā |
om.
| atrāha—yathā hi nānāvyañjanauṣadhidravyasaṃyogādrasaniṣpattiḥ ttirbhavati | yathā hi tathā nānābhāvopagamādrasaniṣpattiḥ| yathā hi—guḍādibhirdravyairvyañjanairauṣadhibhiśca ṣāḍavādayo ṣaḍrasā ṣāḍvādayo rasā svādvādayo rasā rasā nirvartyante tathā
evaṃ nānā nānābhāvopagatā pahitā api sthāyino bhāvā rasatvamāpnuva vanti ntīti | ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
idaṃ nāsti
atrāha—rasa iti kaḥ padārthaḥ | atrocyate
omits.
ucyate—āsvādyatvāt | kathamāsvādyate māsvādyo svādyata iti | yathā nānā kimiti cedatrocyate | yathā hi nānā rasaḥ | yathā hi nānāvyañjanasaṃskṛtamannaṃ bhuñjānā rasānāsvādayanti sumanasaḥ puruṣā harṣā harṣañcādhi dīṃścādhigacchānti tathā nā tathā bhāvā nābhāvābhi
nayavyañjitān vāgaṅgasattvopetān sthāyibhāvānāsvādayanti sumanasaḥ prekṣakāḥ prekṣakāstasmānnāṭyarasā iti vyākhyātāḥ harṣādīṃścādhigacchanti | tasmānnāṭyarasā rasā rasa itya ityabhivyākhyātāḥ | api cātrā atrānuvaṃśyau ślokau bhavataḥ—

lg.l: yathā bahudravyayutai yuktaiḥ guṇaiḥ rvyañjanairbahubhiryutam |
āsvādayanti bhuñjanā bhaktaṃ bhuktaṃ bhuktaṃ bhaktaṃ bhuktaṃ bhaktavido janāḥ || 32 ||
bhāvābhinayasaṃbaddhā saṃyuktān sthāyibhāvāṃstato nsthāyibhāvāṃstathā budhāḥ |
āsvādayanti manasā tasmānnāṭya nāṭye rasāḥ rasāḥ smṛtāḥ || 33 ||

div.p: atrāha—kiṃ rasebhyo bhāvānāmabhinirvṛttirutāho bhāvebhyo rasanāmiti miti ucyate | keṣāñcinmatam rasānām | keṣāñcinmatam | keṣāñcinmataṃ parasparasambandhādeṣāmabhinirvṛttiriti | ta etanna tatkasmāt tanna | dṛśyate nna | kasmāt | dṛśyate hi bhāvebhyo rasānāmabhinirvṛttirna tu rasebhyo na rasebhyo bhāvānāmiti bhāvānāmabhinirvṛttiriti | bhavanti bhavanti vaṃśye ślokāḥ tatra ślokāḥ bhavataścātra ślokau cātra ślokāḥ—

lg.l: nānābhinayasambaddhā sambandhā sambandhān sambaddhā nbhāvayanti rasānimān |
yasmāttasmādamī bhāvā vijñeyā nāṭyayoktṛbhiḥ || 34 ||
nānādravyairbahuvidhairvyañjanaṃ bhāvyate yathā |
evaṃ bhāvā bhāvayanti rasānabhinayaiḥ saha || 35 ||
na bhāvahīno ’sti raso bhāvo vā rasavarjitaḥ na raso bhāvavarjitaḥ na bhāvo rasavarjitaḥ |
parasparakṛtā siddhistayorabhi nayo naye bhavet || 36 ||
vyañjanauṣadhisaṃyogo yathā ’nnaṃ gādyathānnamupapādayet gādyathānnasvādutā bhavet svādutāṃ nayet |

evaṃ bhāvā rasāścaiva bhāvayanti parasparam
has a lacuna here up to V. 52 below.
|| 37 ||
yathā bījādbhavedavṛkṣo vṛkṣāṃ vṛkṣādvījaṃ bhavedyathā vṛkṣātpuṣpaphalaṃ tathā tpuṣpaṃ phalaṃ yathā |

tathā mūlaṃ rasāḥ sarve tebhyo teṣu teṣām tato bhāvā vyavasthitāḥ
‘evamete sthāyino bhāvāḥ rasasaṃjñāḥ pratyavagantavyāḥ’ iti ‘ta’ pustake itaḥ paramadhikaṃ dṛśyate |
|| 38 ||

div.p:
eṣāntvidānīmanubhāvavibhāvavyabhicārisaṃyuktānāmutpati tadeṣāṃ rasānāmutpattivarṇadaiva devatā tanidarśanānyabhivyākhyāsyāmaḥ |
teṣāmutpattihetavaścatvāro rasāḥ | tadyathā—śṛṅgāro raudrau śṛṅgāro vīro raudro vīro bībhatsa iti | tatra nāsti atra—

lg.l: śṛṅgārāddhi śṛṅgārāttu śṛṅgārācca bhaveddhāsyo raudrācca raudrāttu karuṇo rasaḥ |
vīrāccaivādbhutotpattirbībhatsācca bhayānakaḥ || 39 ||
śṛṅgārānukṛtiryā tu sa hāsya iti saṃjñitaḥ hāsyastu prakīrtitaḥ|
raudrasyaiva drasyāpi ca drasya caiva ca yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ || 40 ||
vīrasyāpi vīrasya cāpi ca yatkarma so ’dbhutaḥ parikīrtitaḥ |
bībhatsadarśanaṃ yacca yatra bhavetsa tu yattu bhavetsa tu jñeyaḥ sa tu bhayānakaḥ || 41 ||

div.p: atha varṇāḥ—

lg.l: śyāmo bhavettu śyāmo bhavati śrṛṅgāraḥ sito hāsyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ |
raktau raudro rasaḥ proktaḥ kapotaḥ karuṇastathā kapotaḥ karuṇaścaiva rakto raudraḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 42 ||
gauro vīrastu vijñeyaḥ kṛṣṇaścāpi kṛṣṇaścaiva bhayānakaḥ |
nīlavarṇastu bībhatsaḥ pītaścaivādbhutaḥ smṛtaḥ || 43 ||

div.p: athādhidaivatāni atha daivatāni

lg.l: śrṛṅgāro viṣṇudaivatyo devastu hāsyaḥ pramathadaivataḥ |
raudro rudrādhidaivatyaḥ devastu daivaśca devaśca karuṇo yamadaivataḥ || 44 ||
bībhatsasya mahākālaḥ kāmadevo kāladevo bhayānakaḥ |
vīro māhendradaivatya adbhuto mahendradevaḥ syādadbhuto brahmadaivataḥ || 45 ||

div.p: evameteṣāṃ rasānāmutpattivarṇadaivatānyabhivyākhyātāni |

idānīmanubhāvavibhā eteṣāṃ tvidānīṃ vibhāvānu idānīṃ vibhāvānu vavyabhicārisaṃyuktānāṃ lakṣaṇa lakṣaṇāni saprayojanāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ lakṣaṇāni darśanānyabhivyā lakṣaṇadarśanā nidarśanānyabhivyākhyāsyāmaḥ | sthāyībhāvāṃśca rasānāmanukramiṣyāma iti sthāyibhāvāṃśca rasatvamupaneṣyāmaḥ |
tatra śṛṅgāro nāma ratisthāyibhāvaprabhavaḥ | ujjavalaveṣātmakaḥ veṣātmakatvācchṛṅgāro rasaḥ hyadyojjvalaveṣasvābhāvaḥ | yathā yatkiñci yatkiñcilloke śuci medhyamujjvalaṃ darśanīyaṃ nīyaṃ bhavati tatsarvam
omits उज्ज्वलं
vā tacchṛṅgāreṇopamīyate |
yastāvadujjvalaveṣaḥ yastāvaddhadyojjvalaveṣaḥ veṣātmakaḥ veṣavān saśṛṅgāra iti sa śṛṅgāravānityucyate | yathā ca gotrakulācārotpannānyāptodeśasiddhāni puṃsāṃ nāmāni bhavanti tathaiṣām tathaivaiṣāṃ rasānāṃ bhāvānāṃ ca nāṭyāśritānāṃ cārthānāmācārotpannānyāptopadeśasiddhāni nāmāni |
adds bhavanti | tadevameṣa evameṣa ācārasiddho hyadyojjvalaveṣātmakakatvācchṛṅgāro veṣātmakaḥ śṛṅgāro rasaḥ | sa ca strīpuṃsa strīpuruṣahetuka yuvatiprakṛtiḥ uttamayuvaprakṛtiḥ |

tasya dve adhiṣṭhāne sambhogo vipralambhaśca | tatra sambhogastāvat ṛtumālyā mālyālepana nulepanālaṅkāreṣṭajanaviṣayavarabhavanopabhogopavana bhogavana upavanabhavanānugamanaśravaṇakrīḍālīlāśrayādibhiḥ gamanānubhavanaśravaṇadarśanakrīḍālīlādibhirvibhāvairutpadyate rbhāvaiḥ samutpadyate |
tasya nayanacāturī nayanacāturyabhrūkṣepakaṭākṣasañcāra sañcaraṇa sañcāri lalitamadhurāṅgahāra hārairvākyādibhiḥ vākyādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ bhāvairabhinetavyaḥ prayoktavyaḥ |

vyabhicāriṇaścālasya vyabhicāriṇaścāsyālasyaugyrajugupsāvarjyāḥ varjāḥ varjam | vipralambhakṛtastu nirvedaglāniśaṅkāsūyāśramacintautsukyanidrā nidrāsuptasvapna svapnavibodhavyādhyunmādāpasmārajāṅyamaraṇādibhiranubhāvairabhinetavyaḥ |

atrāha—yadyayaṃ ratiprabhavaḥ śṛṅgāraḥ kathamasya karuṇāśrayiṇo bhāva rasā yadyapaṃ śṛṅgāraḥ tadā kathamidānīmasya karuṇāśrayiṇo bhāvaḥ bhavanti | atrocyate— nanu pūrva pūrvamevābhihitaṃ sambhogavipralambhakṛtaḥ śṛṅgāra
iti | vaiśeṣika vaiśikaśāstrakāreṇa vaiśikaśāstrakāraiśca śāstraiśca daśāvastho ’bhihitaḥ | idaṃ vākyaṃ nāsti tāścāvasthā tāśca sāmānyābhinaye vakṣyāmaḥ |

karuṇaḥ punaḥ karuṇastu tāpakleśeṣṭajanaviyogavibhava śokakleśa vinipātaneṣṭajanaviprayoga. śāpakleśavinipatiteṣṭajanavibhavanāśavadhabandhasamuttho nirapekṣabhāvaḥ | autsukyacintāsamutthaḥ cintābhāvasamutthaḥ sāpekṣabhāvo sāpekṣavipralambhakṛtaḥ vipralambhakṛtaḥ |
evamanyaḥ karuṇo ’nyaśca karuṇo ’nyo vipralambha iti | evameṣa sarvabhāvasaṃyuktaḥ śṛṅgāro bhavati bhavet |
api ca api cātra ślokaḥ atra ślokaḥ

lg.l: sukhaprāyeṣu prāyesaṣṭampannaḥ sampannaḥ ṛtumālyā mālyānu disevakaḥ |
puruṣaḥ puruṣapramadā pramadāyuktaḥ śṛṅgāra iti saṃjñitaḥ || 46 ||

div.p: api cātra sūtrārthānuviddhe sūtrānubandhe sūtrānuviddhe cātrānuvidhe anuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ |

lg.l: ṛtumālā ṛtumālyālaṅkāraiḥ priyajanagāndharvakāvyasevābhiḥ |
upavanagamanavihāraiḥ śṛṅgārarasaḥ samudbhavati || 47 ||
nayanavadanaprasādaiḥ smṛti smitamadhuravacodhṛtipramodaiśca prasādaiśca |
lalitaiścāṅgavilāsaiḥ madhuraiścāṅgaviśeṣaiḥ lalitaiścāṅgavicāraiḥ madhuraiścāṅgavicāraiḥ madhuraiścāṅgavihāraistasyābhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ || 48 ||

div.p:
atha hāsyo nāma hāsasthāyibhāvātmakaḥ | sa ca vikṛtaveṣālaṅkāra vikṛtālokanaparaveṣadhārṣṭya vikṛtaparaveṣālaṅkāradhāṣṭryalaulya kalahāsa kuhanāsatpra kuhakāsatpralāpavyaṅgadarśana doṣādyudāharaṇa doṣodāharādi
bhirvibhāvairūtpadyate | tasyoṣṭhadarśana tasyoṣṭhavivarasaṃdarśananāsā tasyoṣṭhanāsākapolaspandanadṛṣṭi vyākocākuñcanasveda vyākośākuñcanasvedāsyarāgapārśvagrahaṇādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | vyabhicāriṇaścāsya glānyavahittha vyabhicāriṇaścāsyāvahitthālasyatandrānidrāsvapnaprabodhāsūyādayaḥ svapnādayaśca vikṛtālaṅkāravikṛtāśca | dvividhaścāyamātmasthaḥ parasthaśca | tatra yadā yadā svayaṃ hasati tadā ’ ’tmasthaḥ | yadā tu yadā param paraṃ hāsayati tadā parasyaḥ |
bhavataścātrārye atrānuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ |

lg.l: viparītālaṅkārairvikṛtācārābhidhānaveṣaiśca vikṛtāveśābhidhānaceṣṭābhiḥ |
vikṛtairarthavi vikṛtairaṅgavikāraiḥ śeṣairhasatīti rasaḥ smṛto hāsyaḥ || 49 ||
vikṛtākāraiḥ vikṛtācārairvākyairaṅgavikāraiśca vikṛtaveṣaiśca vihārairvikṛtaveṣakṛtaiḥ |
hāsayati janaṃ yasmāttasmājjñeyo raso hāsyaḥ || 50 ||
strīnīcaprakṛtāveṣa prakṛtirayam prakṛtiṣveṣa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dṛśyate rasaḥ |
ṣaḍbhedāścāsya vijñeyāstāṃśca vakṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ || 51 ||
smitamatha hasitaṃ vihasitamupahasitaṃ cāpahasitamatihasitam |
dvau dvau bhedau syātāmuttamamadhyādhamaprakṛtau prakṛteḥ || 52 ||

div.p: atra ślokāḥ nāsti tatra

lg.l: smitahasite jyeṣṭhānāṃ śreṣṭhānām smitahasitaṃ jyeṣṭhānām smitahasitamuttamānām madhyānāṃ vihasitopahasite ca |
adhamānāmapahasitaṃ hyatihasitaṃ cāpi tathātihasitaṃ ca vijñeyam || 53 ||

div.p: atra ślokāḥ—

lg.l: īṣadvyavavasitai iṣadvihasitai īṣadvikasitairgaṇḍaiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ sauṣṭhavānvitaiḥ|

alakṣitadvijaṃ dhīramuttamānāṃ smitaṃ bhavet
Cited in SS
|| 54 ||
utphullānananetraṃ tu netraṃ yat netraistu gaṇḍairvikasitairatha vihasitairatha |
kiñcillakṣitadantaṃ ca hasitaṃ tadvidhīyate gaṇḍañca hasitaṃ tatprakīrtitam || 55 ||

div.p: atha madhyamānām madhyānām :—

lg.l: ākuñcitākṣigaṇḍaṃ yatsasvanaṃ madhuraṃ tathā syātsasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca yat |

kalāgatam kālāgataṃ sāsyarāgaṃ tadvai vihasitaṃ bhavet
cited in SS
|| 56 ||
utphullanāsikaṃ yattu yacca jihmadṛṣṭinirīkṣitam nirīkṣaṇam |
nihañcita nikuñcitāṅgakaśiram nikuñcitāṅgakaśirastaccopahasitaṃ bhavet || 57 ||

div.p: athādhamānāt adhamānām :—

lg.l: asthānahasitaṃ yattu yatra yacca sāśrunetraṃ tathaiva ca |

utkampitāṃsakaśirastaccāpahasitaṃ bhavet
Cited in SS
|| 58 ||
saṃrabdhaṃ sāsranetram saṃrabdhasāśrunetraṃ ca vikṛṣṭasvara viduṣṭasvana vikṛṣṭasvana vikruṣṭa muddhatam |
karopagūḍhapārśva pārśva yat ca taccātihasitaṃ bhavet || 59 ||
hāsa hāsyasthānāni yāni syuḥ kāvyotpannāni kāryotpannāni nāṭake |
uttamādhamamadhyānāmevaṃ tāni prayojayet || 60 ||
evamātmasamutthaśca tathā parasamutthitaḥ | dvividhastriprakṛtikaḥ ṣaḍbhedo ’tha rasaḥ smṛtaḥ|| ityeṣa svasamutthastathā parasamutthaśca vijñeyaḥ|
dvividhastriprakṛtigatastryavasthabhāvo raso hāsyaḥ || 61 ||

div.p: atha karuṇo nāma atha karuṇaḥ śokasthāyibhāvaprabhavaḥ sthāyibhāvātmakaḥ | sa ca sāpekṣakleśa śāpakleśavinipatiteṣṭajanaviprayoga vinipataneṣṭajanaviyoga vibhavanāśavadhabandha bandhaparikleśa vidravopaghāta vyasanasaṃśayādibhiḥ vyasanasaṃyogādibhirvibhāvaiḥ samupajāyate | tasya cāśru tasyāśrupatana tasyāśrupātaparidevanamukhaśoṣaṇavaivarṇya vaivarṇyasvaramukhabheda srastagātratāniśśvāsasmṛtilopādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | vyabhicāriṇaścāsya nirvedaglānicintautsukyāvegabhramamoha mohabhayaśrama śramabhayaviṣādabdainyavyādhijaḍatonmādāpasmāra rālasya trāsālasyamaraṇastambhavepathuvaivarṇyāśrusvarabhedādayaḥ |
atrārye bhavataḥ—

lg.l: iṣṭavadhadarśanādvā vipriyavacanasya saṃśravā saṃśrayādvāpi dvāpi |
ebhirbhāvaviśeṣaiḥ karuṇaraso nāma saṃbhavati || 62 ||
sasvara śvasana sasvanaruditairmohāgamaiśca rmohaprāptyā mohodgamaiśca paridevitairvilapitaiśca |
abhineyaḥkaruṇaraso dehāyāsābhighātaiśca || 63 ||

div.p:
atha raudro nāma krodhasthāyibhāvātmakaḥ rakṣodānavoddhatamanuṣyaprakṛtiḥ manuṣyaprabhavaḥ saṃgrāmahetukaḥ | sa ca krodhādharṣaṇādhikṣepā adhikṣepāvamāna. nṛta sa ca gharṣaṇādhikṣepāmarṣakṛtānṛtavacanopaghāta vacanopaghātavākpāruṣyābhidrohamātsaryādibhirvibhāvairutpadyate | tasya ca tāḍanapāṭanapīḍanacchedana chedyabhedyapraharaṇāpaharaṇa bhedanapraharaṇāharaṇaśastrasampāta sampādana samprahārarudhirākarṣaṇā
rudhirāsrākarṣaṇādyāni radhirāsrāvaṇādyāni rudhirākarṣaṇādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | punaśca dyāni karmāṇi kāryāṇi | punaśca raktanayana .sveda. bhrukuṭīkaraṇa gaṇḍacālana .karaṇāvaṣṭambha. dantoṣṭhapīḍanagaṇḍasphuraṇaha agrahasta stāgraniṣpeṣādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ |
vyabhicāriṇaścāsyāsammo bhāvāścāsya saṃmoha bhāvāścāsyāsammohotsāhāvegāmarṣacapalataugyragarva taugyrasveda svedavepathuromāñcagadgadādayaḥ daromāñcādayaḥ |

atrāha—yadabhihitaṃ rākṣasādīnām kṣodānavānām rakṣodānavādīnāṃ raudro rasaḥ | kimanyeṣāṃ kimanyeṣāṃ nāstītyucyate raudrarasaḥ sa kimanyāsāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ nāstīti | atrocyate mānavaprakṛtīnāṃ nāstīti nāsti | ucyate—astyanyeṣāmapi raudro rasaḥ | kintvadhikāro ’tra gṛhyate | te hi svabhāvata eva raudrāḥ | yasmāt
omits
kasmāt | bahubāhavo bahumukhāḥ bahuśīrṣā bahumukhāḥ
proddhūtavikīrṇapiṅgalaśirojāḥ raktodvṛttavilocanā vilocanabhīmāsita bhīmāsitarūpiṇaścaiva | yacca kiñcitsamārabhante svabhāva svabhāve svabhāvena ceṣṭitaṃ vāgaṅgādikaṃ tatsarva raudramevaiteṣām raudrameveti |
maidaṃ vākyaṃ nāsti
śṛṅgāraśca taiḥ prāyaśaḥ prasabhaṃ sevyate | teṣāṃ cānukāriṇo anugāmino ye ye ’pyuddhatāḥ puruṣāḥ puruṣā uddhatāḥ puruṣāsteṣāmapi saṅgrāmasamprahārakṛto raudro raso ’numantavyaḥ |
atrānuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ—

lg.l: sattva yuddhaprahāraghā pāta ghātau vicchedavidāraṇaiścaiva tanavikṛtacchedanavidāraṇaiścaiva |
saṅgrāmasambhramā sambhavārthaiḥ sambhramotthaiḥ dyairebhiḥ sañjāyate raudraḥ raudraraso nāma sambhavati || 64 ||
nānāpraharaṇamokṣaiḥ saṅkulaśiraḥ śiraḥkabandhabhujakartanaiścaiva |
ebhistvartha ebhiścārthaviśeṣairasyā ṣaistasyā bhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ || 65 ||
iti raudraraso dṛṣṭo raudravāgaṅgaceṣṭitaḥ|
śastraprahārabhūyiṣṭha ugrakarmakriyātmakaḥ || 66 ||

div.p: atha vīraraso vīro nāmottamaprakṛtirutsāhātmakaḥ | sa cāsaṃmohādhya- vasāyanayavinayabala bahula parākramaśaktipratāpaprabhāvādibhirvibhāvairutpadyate | tasya sthairyadhairyaśauryatyāga dhairyatyāgaśauryavīryavaiśāradyādibhiḥ vaiśāradyādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | sañcāribhāvāścāsya vyabhicāriṇaśca bhāvāścāsya dhṛtimatigarvāvegaugyrāmarṣasmṛtiromāñcādayaḥ romāñcapratibodhādayaḥ | atrārye atrānuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ atrārye rasavicāramukhe—

lg.l: utsāhā(ho ’)dhyavasāyādaviṣāditvādavismayāmohāt|
vividhādarthaviśeṣādvīraraso nāma sambhavati || 67 ||
sthitiśauryavīryadhairyairu smṛtidhairyavīryaśauryai. sthitidhairyavīryagarvairutsāhaparākramaprabhāvaiśca |
vākyaiścākṣepakṛtairvīrarasaḥ samyagabhineyaḥ || 68 ||

div.p: atha bhayānako nāma bhayasthāyibhāvātmakaḥ bhāvaprabhavaḥ | sa ca vikṛtaveṣadarśanaśivolūka vikṛtarasasattvadarśanaśivolūkolkātrāsodvegaśūnyāgārāraṇyaśmaśānaśūnyabhavanagamanamaraṇasvajanavadhabandhadarśanaśravaṇakathābhirvibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate vikṛtaravasattvadarśanaśivolūka trāsodvegāraṇyaśmaśānaśūnyabhavanapraveśamaraṇa trāsodvegaśūnyāgārāraṇyagamanasvajanavadhabandhadarśanaśrutikathādibhirvibhāvairutpadyate | tasya pravepitakaracaraṇanayana calanamukhagātrapulakamukha nayanavalanapulakamukha capalapulakamukhavaivarṇyasvararabhedādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ |

vyabhicāribhāvāścāsya #tavyabhicāriṇaścāsya śaṅkādainyāvegacāpalajaḍatātrāsāpasmāramaraṇādayaḥ | stambhasvedaromāñcagadgadavepathusvarabhedavaivarṇyādayaḥ sāttvikāśca | atrāpyāryā bhavanti | bhāvāścāsya stambhasvedagadgadaromāñcavepathusvarabhedavaivarṇyaśaṅkāmohadainyāvegacāpalajaḍatātrāsāpasmāramaraṇādayaḥ |
atrāryāḥ atrānuvaṃśyā āryā bhavanti —

lg.l: vikṛtaravasattvadarśanasaṃgrāmāraṇyaśūnyagṛhagamanāt |
gurunṛpayoraparādhātkṛtakaśca tathā budhairjaiyaḥ bhayānako jñeyaḥ || 69 ||
gotra gātramukhadṛṣṭibhedai dṛṣṭikampai rūrustambhā stabhbhādi bhivīkṣaṇodvegaiḥ |
sannamukhaśoṣahṛdaya hṛdaye spandanaromodgamaiśca bhayam || 70 ||
etatsvabhāvajaṃ syātsattvasamutthaṃ tathaiva kartavyam |
punarebhireva bhāvaiḥ kṛtakaṃ mṛduceṣṭitaiḥ mṛduceṣṭitaiśca bhayam kāryam || 71 ||
karacaraṇavepathustambhagātrahṛdayaprakampena vepanena stambhena ca gātrahṛdayakampena karacaraṇavepanakṛtairgātrastambhaiśca hṛdayakampena gātrasaṅkocahṛdayakampena |
śuṣkoṣṭhatālukaṇṭhairbhayānako nityamabhineyaḥ || 72 ||

div.p: atha bībhatso nāma jugupsāsthāyibhāvātmakaḥ | sa cāhṛdyāpriyāpekṣāni hṛdyāpraśastāpriyāvekṣā cāhṛdyāpriyācokṣāniṣṭaśravaṇadarśanakīrtanādibhirvibhāvairutpadyate | tasya sa sarvāṅgasaṃprahāra sarvāṅgasaṅkoca rvāṅgasaṃhāramukhavikūṇa mukhanetravikūṇana nollekhananiṣṭhīnodvejanādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | vyabhicāribhāvāścāsyāpasmāragrahaceṣṭitāvega bhāvāścāsyāpasmārodvegāvegamohavyādhimaraṇādayaḥ |
atrānuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ atrārye bhavataḥ —

lg.l: anabhihita anabhimatadarśanena ca rasagandha gandharasasparśaśabdadoṣaiśca |
udvejane ca udvejanaiśca bahubhirbībhatsarasaḥ samuddhavati || 73 ||
mukhanetravikūṇa vikūṇananayananāsā. nayā nāsāpracchādanāvanamitāsyaiḥ pracchādanādavanatāsyaiḥ |
avyaktapādapatanairbībhatsaḥ samyagabhineyaḥ patanaistasyābhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ patanaiḥ samyagabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ || 74 ||

div.p:
athā adbhuto dbhuto nāma vismayasthāyibhāvātmakaḥ | sa ca divyajanadarśanepsitamanorathāvāptyu ptyuttamavanadevakulādigamanasambhāvyamānamāyenadrajālasaṃsādhanā pavanadevakulādigamanasabhāvimānamāyendrajālasambhāvanādibhirvibhāvairutpadyate | tasya nayanavistārānimeṣaprekṣaṇaromāñcāśrusvedaharṣasādhuvāda sādhuvacana. dānaprabandhahāhākārabāhuvadanacelāṅguli kāracelāṅguli pramāṇādibhiḥ karacaraṇāṅguli bhramaṇādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ | vyabhicāribhāvāścāsya bhāvāścāsya stambhā
śrusvedagadgadaromāñcāvegasambhrama saṃbhramapraharṣacapalatonmādadhṛti jaḍatāmohamaraṇādayaḥ jaḍatāpralayādayaḥ | atrānuvaṃśye ārye bhavataḥ—

lg.l: yattvatiśayārthayuktaṃ vākyaṃ śilpaṃ ca karmarūpaṃ vā rūpaṃ ca |
ebhistvarthaviśeṣai raso ’dbhuto nāma vijñeyaḥ tatsaṃbaddhaiḥ sarvai raso ’ddhuto nāma tatsarvamaddhutarase vibhāvarūpaṃ hi vijñeyam || 75 ||
sparśagrahotkahasanaiḥ sparśagrahograhasanai sparśapraharaṇollasanaiḥ sparśagrahaṇairulbakaśa sparśagrahollukasanairhāhākaraiśca sādhuvādaiśca |
vepathugadgadavacanaiḥ vacanasvedā svedādyairabhinayastasya nayaścāsya || 76 ||

tapustake ime ślokāḥ śāntarasaprakaraṇātparaṃ dṛśyante
śṛṅgāraṃ trividhaṃ vidyātbhrūnepathya vidyādvāṅnaipathyakriyātmakam |
aṅganaipathyavākyaiśca hāsyaraudrau tathā smṛtau tridhā smṛtau || 77 ||
dharmopaghātaja ghātaka ścaiva tathārthāpacayoddhavaḥ |
tathā yogakṛta śokakṛtaścaiva karuṇastrividhaḥ smṛtaḥ || 78 ||
dānavīraṃ dharmavīraṃ yuddhavīramatastridhā yuddhavīraṃ tathaiva ca |

rasa rasavīrama vīramapi prāhustajjñāḥ | trividhasammatam vīramapi prāha brahmā trividhameva hi
Cited in SS
|| 79 ||
vyājāccaivāparādhācca vitrāsitakameva ca |

punarbhayānaka
N closes chapter here. It adds last Verse 83 below.
syāpi vidyāt trividhameva hi || 80 ||
bībhatsaḥ kṣobhajaḥ bhaṇaḥ śuddha udvegī syāttṛtīyakaḥ syāt dvitīyakaḥ |
viṣṭhākṛmibhirudvegī kṣobha kṣobhaṇo jo rudhirādijaḥ || 81 ||
dvivyaścānandajaścaiva dvidhā khyāto ’dbhuto rasaḥ |
divyadarśanajo divyo harṣādānanjajaḥ smṛtaḥ || 82 ||

div.p:
(
amabapustakeṣu śāntarasagrantho nāsti | ta pustaka eva vidyate
śāntamidānīṃ ākhyāsyāmaḥ tatra— atha śānto nāma śamasthāyibhāvātmako mokṣapravartakaḥ | sa tu tattvajñānavairāgyāśayaśudadhyādibhirvibhāvaiḥ samutpadyate | tasya yamaniyamādhyātmadadhyānadhāraṇopāsanasarvabhūtadayāliṅgagrahaṇādibhiranubhāvairabhinayaḥ
prayoktavyaḥ | vyabhicāriṇaścāsya nirvedasmṛtidhṛtisarvāśramaśaucastambharomāñcādayaḥ | atrāryāḥ ślokāśca bhavanti—

lg.l: mokṣādhyātma nimittaḥ samutthastattvajñānārthahetusaṃyuktaḥ |
naiḥśreyasopadiṣṭaḥ niḥśreyasasaṃyuktaḥ śāntaraso nāma sambhavati vijñeyaḥ ||
buddhīndriyakarmendriyasaṃrodhādhyātmasaṃsthitopetaḥ nirodhato ’dhyātmasaṃjñitaścaiva |
sarvaprāṇihitaḥ khalu sarvaprāṇisukhahitaḥ śāntaraso nāma vijñeyaḥ vijñeyaḥ | bhavati cātra ślokaḥ- ||
na yatra duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ |
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sa śāntaḥ prathito rasaḥ ||
bhāvā vikārā ratyādyāḥ śāntastu prakṛtirmataḥ |
vikāraḥ prakṛterjātaḥ punastatraiva līyate ||
svaṃ svaṃ nimittamāsādya śāntādbhāvaḥ pravartate |
punarnimittāpāye ca śānta evopalīyate ||
evaṃ navarasā dṛṣṭā nāṭyajñairlakṣaṇānvitāḥ |)
evamete rasā jñeyāstvaṣṭau lakṣaṇalakṣitāḥ |
ata ūrdhva pravakṣyāmi bhāvānāmapi lakṣaṇam || 83 ||

div.trailer: iti bhāratīye nāṭyaśāstre rasādhyāyaḥ rasavikalpo nāma rasasvarūpaparipātanaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ ||
